## Checklist
- [ ] Runs lint locally (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Typecheck passes (`npm run check`)
- [ ] Unit tests pass (`npm run test:unit`)
- [ ] Build succeeds (`npm run build`)
- [ ] Added/updated tests where applicable
- [ ] Updated documentation (README/CONTRIBUTING) if required
